text: Abraham Moshe Hillel (1820-1920) served as Chief Rabbi of Baghdad during the years 1884, 1886–1889, and 1911–1915. He was a pupil of Rabbi Abdallah Somekh. == References == Category:1820 births Category:1920 deaths Category:Chief rabbis of cities Category:Jews and Judaism in Baghdad Category:People from Baghdad
title: Abraham Hillel
